The book is filled with pages of text that seem to be written in a language that the reader doesn't understand.
The reader becomes obsessed with trying to decipher the language and the story within the book.
As the reader continues to read, they begin to notice that the book is changing, the pages are shifting and rearranging themselves, and the words are becoming clearer.
The reader realizes that the book is alive, and it is writing itself as they read.
The reader becomes the protagonist in the story, and they must navigate the world that the book has created for them.
